name: Sina Hadipour-Lakmehsari
title: Show Host
bio: Hi everyone! My name is Sina and I'm in my second year of the MD program at U of T. This is my first year at Raw Talk and Iâ€™m very excited to be a part of this amazing team. Previously, I completed my MSc at U of T in the Department of Physiology studying the molecular mechanisms behind cardiac diseases such as myocardial infarctions and hypertrophic cardiomyopathy. Science communication has always been a huge passion of mine and I'm looking forward to creating informative and interactive content for your listening pleasure!
